Text: Can you IDIOTS specify if it's PAL or NTSC!!!!

Try to ask it nicely
then I aswer you
Go fuck yourself...I will download from someone else bitch
NTSC or PAL?  It IS important information that needs to be known.

I have to agree, region is a pretty relevant piece of information.

Since BB can't manage to include that info for whatever reason, a look at the VIDEO_TS.IFO and VTS_01_0.IFO in IfoEdit indicate that this is NTSC format.
"Go fuck yourself..."? "Bitch...."? Wow, what an ingrateful suckwad. THANK YOU, BB!
